washerwoman.name: Washerwoman
washerwoman.ability: You start knowing that 1 of 2 players is a particular Townsfolk.

librarian.name: Librarian
librarian.ability: You start knowing that 1 of 2 players is a particular Outsider.

alchemist.name: Alchemist
alchemist.ability: You have a Minion ability. When using this, the Storyteller may prompt you to choose differently.

amnesiac.name: Amnesiac
amnesiac.ability: You do not know what your ability is. Each day, privately guess what it is: you learn how accurate you are.

artist.name: Artist
artist.ability: Once per game, during the day, privately ask the Storyteller any yes/no question.

atheist.name: Atheist
atheist.ability: The Storyteller can break the game rules, and if executed, good wins, even if you are dead. [No evil characters]

balloonist.name: Balloonist
balloonist.ability: Each night, you learn a player of a different character type than last night. [+0 or +1 Outsider]

bountyhunter.name: Bounty Hunter
bountyhunter.ability: You start knowing 1 evil player. If the player you know dies, you learn another evil player tonight. [1 Townsfolk is evil]

cannibal.name: Cannibal
cannibal.ability: You have the ability of the recently killed executee. If they are evil, you are poisoned until a good player dies by execution.

chambermaid.name: Chambermaid
chambermaid.ability: Each night, choose 2 alive players (not yourself): you learn how many woke tonight due to their ability.

chef.name: Chef
chef.ability: You start knowing how many pairs of evil players there are.

choirboy.name: Choirboy
choirboy.ability: If the Demon kills the King, you learn which player is the Demon. [+the King]

clockmaker.name: Clockmaker
clockmaker.ability: You start knowing how many steps from the Demon to its nearest Minion.

courtier.name: Courtier
courtier.ability: Once per game, at night, choose a character: they are drunk for 3 nights & 3 days.

cultleader.name: Cult Leader
cultleader.ability: Each night, you become the alignment of an alive neighbour. If all good players choose to join your cult, your team wins.

dreamer.name: Dreamer
dreamer.ability: Each night, choose a player (not yourself or Travellers): you learn 1 good & 1 evil character, 1 of which is correct.

empath.name: Empath
empath.ability: Each night, you learn how many of your 2 alive neighbors are evil.

engineer.name: Engineer
engineer.ability: Once per game, at night, choose which Minions or which Demon is in play.

exorcist.name: Exorcist
exorcist.ability: Each night*, choose a player (different to last night): the Demon, if chosen, learns who you are then doesn't wake tonight.

farmer.name: Farmer
farmer.ability: If you die at night, an alive good player becomes a Farmer.

fisherman.name: Fisherman
fisherman.ability: Once per game, during the day, visit the Storyteller for some advice to help your team win.

flowergirl.name: Flowergirl
flowergirl.ability: Each night*, you learn if a Demon voted today.

fool.name: Fool
fool.ability: The 1st time you die, you don't.

fortuneteller.name: Fortune Teller
fortuneteller.ability: Each night, choose 2 players: you learn if either is a Demon. There is a good player that registers as a Demon to you.

gambler.name: Gambler
gambler.ability: Each night*, choose a player & guess their character: if you guess wrong, you die.

general.name: General
general.ability: Each night, you learn which alignment the Storyteller believes is winning: good, evil, or neither.

gossip.name: Gossip
gossip.ability: Each day, you may make a public statement. Tonight, if it was true, a player dies.

grandmother.name: Grandmother
grandmother.ability: You start knowing a good player & their character. If the Demon kills them, you die too.

huntsman.name: Huntsman
huntsman.ability: Once per game, at night, choose a living player: the Damsel, if chosen, becomes a not-in-play Townsfolk. [+the Damsel]

innkeeper.name: Innkeeper
innkeeper.ability: Each night*, choose 2 players: they can't die tonight, but 1 is drunk until dusk.

investigator.name: Investigator
investigator.ability: You start knowing that 1 of 2 players is a particular Minion.

juggler.name: Juggler
juggler.ability: On your 1st day, publicly guess up to 5 players' characters. That night, you learn how many you got correct.

king.name: King
king.ability: Each night, if the dead equal or outnumber the living, you learn 1 alive character. The Demon knows who you are.

lycanthrope.name: Lycanthrope
lycanthrope.ability: Each night*, choose an alive player. If good, they die & the Demon doesn't kill tonight. One good player registers as evil.

magician.name: Magician
magician.ability: The Demon thinks you are a Minion. Minions think you are a Demon.

mathematician.name: Mathematician
mathematician.ability: Each night, you learn how many players' abilities worked abnormally (since dawn) due to another character's ability.

mayor.name: Mayor
mayor.ability: If only 3 players live & no execution occurs, your team wins. If you die at night, another player might die instead.

minstrel.name: Minstrel
minstrel.ability: When a Minion dies by execution, all other players (except Travellers) are drunk until dusk tomorrow.

monk.name: Monk
monk.ability: Each night*, choose a player (not yourself): they are safe from the Demon tonight.

nightwatchman.name: Nightwatchman
nightwatchman.ability: Once per game, at night, choose a player: they learn who you are.

noble.name: Noble
noble.ability: You start knowing 3 players, 1 and only 1 of which is evil.

oracle.name: Oracle
oracle.ability: Each night*, you learn how many dead players are evil.

pacifist.name: Pacifist
pacifist.ability: Executed good players might not die.

philosopher.name: Philosopher
philosopher.ability: Once per game, at night, choose a good character: gain that ability. If this character is in play, they are drunk.

pixie.name: Pixie
pixie.ability: You start knowing 1 in-play Townsfolk. If you were mad that you were this character, you gain their ability when they die.

poppygrower.name: Poppy Grower
poppygrower.ability: Minions & Demons do not know each other. If you die, they learn who each other are that night.

preacher.name: Preacher
preacher.ability: Each night, choose a player: a Minion, if chosen, learns this. All chosen Minions have no ability.

professor.name: Professor
professor.ability: Once per game, at night*, choose a dead player: if they are a Townsfolk, they are resurrected.

ravenkeeper.name: Ravenkeeper
ravenkeeper.ability: If you die at night, you are woken to choose a player: you learn their character.

sage.name: Sage
sage.ability: If the Demon kills you, you learn that it is 1 of 2 players.

sailor.name: Sailor
sailor.ability: Each night, choose an alive player: either you or they are drunk until dusk. You can't die.

savant.name: Savant
savant.ability: Each day, you may visit the Storyteller to learn 2 things in private: 1 is true & 1 is false.

seamstress.name: Seamstress
seamstress.ability: Once per game, at night, choose 2 players (not yourself): you learn if they are the same alignment.

slayer.name: Slayer
slayer.ability: Once per game, during the day, publicly choose a player: if they are the Demon, they die.

snakecharmer.name: Snake Charmer
snakecharmer.ability: Each night, choose an alive player: a chosen Demon swaps characters & alignments with you & is then poisoned.

soldier.name: Soldier
soldier.ability: You are safe from the Demon.

tealady.name: Tea Lady
tealady.ability: If both your alive neighbors are good, they can't die.

towncrier.name: Town Crier
towncrier.ability: Each night*, you learn if a Minion nominated today.

undertaker.name: Undertaker
undertaker.ability: Each night*, you learn which character died by execution today.

virgin.name: Virgin
virgin.ability: The 1st time you are nominated, if the nominator is a Townsfolk, they are executed immediately.

knight.name: Knight
knight.ability: You start knowing 2 players that are not the Demon.

highpriestess.name: High Priestess
highpriestess.ability: Each night, learn which player the Storyteller believes you should talk to most.

shugenja.name: Shugenja
shugenja.ability: You start knowing if your closest evil player is clockwise or anti-clockwise. If equidistant, this info is arbitrary.

villageidiot.name: Village Idiot
villageidiot.ability: Each night, choose a player: you learn their alignment. [+0 to +2 Village Idiots. One of the extras is drunk.]

banshee.name: Banshee
banshee.ability: If the Demon kills you, all players learn this. From now on, you may nominate twice per day and vote twice per nomination.

alsaahir.name: Alsaahir
alsaahir.ability: Once per day, if you publicly guess which players are Minion(s) and which are Demon(s), good wins.

acrobat.name: Acrobat
acrobat.ability: Each night*, choose another player: if they are or become drunk or poisoned tonight, you die.

princess.name: Princess
princess.ability: On your 1st day, if you nominated & executed a player, the Demon doesn't kill tonight.

drunk.name: Drunk
drunk.ability: You do not know you are the Drunk. You think you are a Townsfolk character, but you are not.

saint.name: Saint
saint.ability: If you die by execution, your team loses.

butler.name: Butler
butler.ability: Each night, choose a player (not yourself): tomorrow, you may only vote if they are voting too.

recluse.name: Recluse
recluse.ability: You might register as evil & as a Minion or Demon, even if dead.

barber.name: Barber
barber.ability: If you died today or tonight, the Demon may choose 2 players (not another Demon) to swap characters.

sweetheart.name: Sweetheart
sweetheart.ability: When you die, 1 player is drunk from now on.

mutant.name: Mutant
mutant.ability: If you are "mad" about being an Outsider, you might be executed.

klutz.name: Klutz
klutz.ability: When you learn that you died, publicly choose 1 alive player: if they are evil, your team loses.

goon.name: Goon
goon.ability: Each night, the 1st player to choose you with their ability is drunk until dusk. You become their alignment.

moonchild.name: Moonchild
moonchild.ability: When you learn that you died, publicly choose 1 alive player. Tonight, if it was a good player, they die.

tinker.name: Tinker
tinker.ability: You might die at any time.

lunatic.name: Lunatic
lunatic.ability: You think you are a Demon, but you are not. The Demon knows who you are & who you choose at night.

damsel.name: Damsel
damsel.ability: All Minions know you are in play. If a Minion publicly guesses you (once), your team loses.

golem.name: Golem
golem.ability: You may only nominate once per game. When you do, if the nominee is not the Demon, they die.

politician.name: Politician
politician.ability: If you were the player most responsible for your team losing, you change alignment & win, even if dead.

puzzlemaster.name: Puzzlemaster
puzzlemaster.ability: 1 player is drunk, even if you die. If you guess (once) who it is, learn the Demon player, but guess wrong & get false info.

heretic.name: Heretic
heretic.ability: Whoever wins, loses & whoever loses, wins, even if you are dead.

plaguedoctor.name: Plague Doctor
plaguedoctor.ability: If you die, the Storyteller gains a Minion ability.

hatter.name: Hatter
hatter.ability: If you died today or tonight, the Minion & Demon players may choose new Minion & Demon characters to be.

ogre.name: Ogre
ogre.ability: On your 1st night, choose a player (not yourself): you become their alignment (you don't know which) even if drunk or poisoned.

zealot.name: Zealot
zealot.ability: If 5 or more players are alive, you must vote for every nomination.

hermit.name: Hermit
hermit.ability: You have all Outsider abilities. [-0 or -1 Outsider]

baron.name: Baron
baron.ability: There are extra Outsiders in play. [+2 Outsiders]

poisoner.name: Poisoner
poisoner.ability: Each night, choose a player: they are poisoned tonight and tomorrow day.

scarletwoman.name: Scarlet Woman
scarletwoman.ability: If there are 5 or more players alive & the Demon dies, you become the Demon. (Travellers don't count)

spy.name: Spy
spy.ability: Each night, you see the Grimoire. You might register as good & as a Townsfolk or Outsider, even if dead.

witch.name: Witch
witch.ability: Each night, choose a player: if they nominate tomorrow, they die. If just 3 players live, you lose this ability.

eviltwin.name: Evil Twin
eviltwin.ability: You & an opposing player know each other. If the good player is executed, evil wins. Good can't win if you both live.

pithag.name: Pit-Hag
pithag.ability: Each night*, choose a player & a character they become (if not in play). If a Demon is made, deaths tonight are arbitrary.

cerenovus.name: Cerenovus
cerenovus.ability: Each night, choose a player & a good character: they are "mad" they are this character tomorrow, or might be executed.

assassin.name: Assassin
assassin.ability: Once per game, at night*, choose a player: they die, even if for some reason they could not.

godfather.name: Godfather
godfather.ability: You start knowing which Outsiders are in play. If 1 died today, choose a player tonight: they die. [-1 or +1 Outsider]

mastermind.name: Mastermind
mastermind.ability: If the Demon dies by execution (ending the game), play for 1 more day. If a player is then executed, their team loses.

devilsadvocate.name: Devil's Advocate
devilsadvocate.ability: Each night, choose a living player (different to last night): if executed tomorrow, they don't die.

boomdandy.name: Boomdandy
boomdandy.ability: If you are executed, all but 3 players die. After a 10 to 1 countdown, the player with the most players pointing at them, dies.

fearmonger.name: Fearmonger
fearmonger.ability: Each night, choose a player: if you nominate & execute them, their team loses. All players know if you choose a new player.

marionette.name: Marionette
marionette.ability: You think you are a good character, but you are not. The Demon knows who you are. [You neighbor the Demon]

mezepheles.name: Mezepheles
mezepheles.ability: You start knowing a secret word. The 1st good player to say this word becomes evil that night.

psychopath.name: Psychopath
psychopath.ability: Each day, before nominations, you may publicly choose a player: they die. If executed, you only die if you lose roshambo.

widow.name: Widow
widow.ability: On your first night, look at the Grimoire & choose a player: they are poisoned. 1 good player knows a Widow is in play.

goblin.name: Goblin
goblin.ability: If you publicly claim to be the Goblin when nominated & are executed that day, your team wins.

organgrinder.name: Organ Grinder
organgrinder.ability: All players keep their eyes closed when voting and the vote tally is secret. Each night, choose if you are drunk or not.

vizier.name: Vizier
vizier.ability: All players know who you are. You can not die during the day. If good voted, you may choose to execute immediately.

harpy.name: Harpy
harpy.ability: Each night, choose 2 players: tomorrow, the 1st player is mad that the 2nd is evil, or one or both might die.

summoner.name: Summoner
summoner.ability: You get 3 bluffs. On night 3, choose a player: they become an evil Demon of your choice. [No Demon]

boffin.name: Boffin
boffin.ability: The Demon (even if drunk or poisoned) has a not-in-play good character's ability. You both know which.

xaan.name: Xaan
xaan.ability: On night X, all Townsfolk are poisoned until dusk. [X Outsiders]

wizard.name: Wizard
wizard.ability: Once per game, choose to make a wish. If granted, it might have a price & leave a clue as to its nature.

imp.name: Imp
imp.ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. If you kill yourself this way, a Minion becomes the Imp.

fanggu.name: Fang Gu
fanggu.ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. The 1st Outsider this kills becomes an evil Fang Gu & you die instead. [+1 Outsider]

vigormortis.name: Vigormortis
vigormortis.ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. Minions you kill keep their ability & poison 1 Townsfolk neighbor. [-1 Outsider]

nodashii.name: No Dashii
nodashii.ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. Your 2 Townsfolk neighbors are poisoned.

vortox.name: Vortox
vortox.ability: Each night*, choose a player; they die. Townsfolk abilities yield false info. Each day, if no-one is executed, evil wins.

po.name: Po
po.ability: Each night*, you may choose a player: they die. If your last choice was no-one, choose 3 players tonight.

pukka.name: Pukka
pukka.ability: Each night, choose a player: they are poisoned. The previously poisoned player dies then becomes healthy.

shabaloth.name: Shabaloth
shabaloth.ability: Each night*, choose 2 players: they die. A dead player you chose last night might be regurgitated.

zombuul.name: Zombuul
zombuul.ability: Each night*, if no-one died today, choose a player: they die. The 1st time you die, you live but register as dead.

alhadikhia.name: Al-Hadikhia
alhadikhia.ability: Each night*, you may choose 3 players (all players learn who): each silently chooses to live or die, but if all live, all die.

riot.name: Riot
riot.ability: On day 3, Minions become Riot & nominees die but nominate an alive player immediately. This must happen.

leviathan.name: Leviathan
leviathan.ability: If more than 1 good player is executed, evil wins. All players know you are in play. After day 5, evil wins.

lleech.name: Lleech
lleech.ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. You start by choosing a player: they are poisoned. You die if & only if they are dead.

legion.name: Legion
legion.ability: Each night*, a player might die. Executions fail if only evil voted. You register as a Minion too. [Most players are Legion]

lilmonsta.name: Lil' Monsta
lilmonsta.ability: Each night, Minions choose who babysits Lil' Monsta & 'is the Demon'. Each night*, a player might die. [+1 Minion]

ojo.name: Ojo
ojo.ability: Each night*, choose a character: they die. If they are not in play, the Storyteller chooses who dies.

kazali.name: Kazali
kazali.ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. [You choose which players are which Minions. -? to +? Outsiders]

yaggababble.name: Yaggababble
yaggababble.ability: You start knowing a secret phrase. For each time you said it publicly today, a player might die.

lordoftyphon.name: Lord of Typhon
lordoftyphon.ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. [Evil characters are in a line. You are in the middle. +1 Minion. -? to +? Outsiders]
